name: squish-a-saurus crochet dino
sizes_available: any, gauged by yarn and appropriate hook.
notes:
a few directions in the pattern say "twice" instead of "rep from * around"
you will need to weave the tail of the head through the end and pull it closed. that part is missing from the instructions.
do watch the video included!

i highly recommend a removable stitch marker and notes to make tick marks of the rounds as you complete them.

you will also need safety eyes or buttons.

i made this dino with bulky yarn. details about adjusting for that in my notes on my project.
